answerText: adrenal gland[10] Waterhouse-Friderichsen syndrome occurs when the adrenal glands hemorrhage and die. Such a syndrome would naturally mimic this disease, in which the adrenal glands are chronically insufficient.

question: Question:  [10] Name this pair of glands located immediately above the kidneys, which are responsible for secreting cortisol and epinephrine.
